topic: Uncovering the heart of my Nana’s saltwater stories

ideas.title: Nana's Barramundi Bonanza
ideas.premise: Nana, dressed as a pirate at South Melbourne Market, tries to sell suspiciously cheap “fresh” barramundi while winking conspiratorially.
ideas.why_funny: Juxtaposition of sweet Nana with dodgy dealings. Fishy business (literally!).

ideas.title: The St Kilda Penguin Prophecy
ideas.premise: Nana interprets the movements of St Kilda's penguins to predict AFL match outcomes, with hilariously inaccurate results.
ideas.why_funny: Aussie Rules football meets bizarre, yet endearing, penguin-based fortune telling.

ideas.title: Saltwater Secrets of the Yarra
ideas.premise: A tour guide tries to tell tourists about the Yarra River's history, but Nana keeps interrupting with increasingly outlandish “true” saltwater stories.
ideas.why_funny: Contrasting dull facts with Nana's absurd tall tales about the Yarra.

ideas.title: Fairy Penguins & Fish n' Chips
ideas.premise: Nana is sharing tall tales about the penguins' 'superior' fish and chip preferences down at St Kilda pier
ideas.why_funny: The irony of a sweet Nana sharing elaborate meals only a penguin would eat.

ideas.title: Great Ocean Road Rage
ideas.premise: Nana, driving aggressively along the Great Ocean Road, claims her navigational skills come from 'ancient saltwater maps'.
ideas.why_funny: Combining Nana's niceness with road rage and a hilariously bad map.
